body.p: In response to a notice recd from the State Department of Kentucky -- pss the assistant Secy of State. Mr Tate If I am correct in his name, I remitted the fee of 5.00 on the renewal of my appointment as a commissioner for said State The money was mailed at Albany April 17.h. 1861 -- by me, and I have not been able to get any answer to several of my letters addressed to the Asst Secy of State.
I have the Receipt on Registering said Letter. as no. 71 & I will thank you to have this matter attended to by your officers

New York
Comr. of Deeds
Wm Furniss
N.Y. City

Law and Collection Office.
WILLIAM FURNISS,
